title: Effective Communication in the Workplace (工作)
english: Clear and effective communication is the foundation of a successful team and a productive workplace. Poor communication, on the other hand, often leads to misunderstandings, errors, and wasted time.

One key to improving communication is **active listening**. This means paying full attention to the speaker, not just waiting for your turn to talk. Nodding, making eye contact, and summarizing their points show you are engaged.
When you are the one speaking, be direct and concise. Avoid using excessive jargon or vague language. Structure your message with the main point first, followed by supporting details.

Furthermore, choose the right medium. Urgent matters usually require a phone call or face-to-face discussion, while non-urgent updates are suitable for email. Mastering these skills is essential for career advancement.
chinese: 清晰有效的沟通是成功团队和高效工作场所的基础。另一方面，糟糕的沟通往往会导致误解、错误和时间浪费。
改善沟通的一个关键是**积极倾听**。这意味着要全神贯注于说话者，而不仅仅是等待轮到自己说话。点头、眼神交流和总结他们的观点表明你参与其中。
当你说话时，要直接而简洁。避免使用过多的行话或模糊的语言。组织你的信息，先讲主要观点，然后是支持细节。
此外，选择正确的媒介。紧急事务通常需要电话或面对面讨论，而非紧急更新则适合电子邮件。掌握这些技能对于职业发展至关重要。
